thread.title: Democrat Ned Lamont to Run for Connecticut Governor

author: Joseph De Avila
title: Democrat Ned Lamont to Run for Connecticut Governor
text:
Greenwich businessman Ned Lamont, a Democrat who led an insurgent U.S. Senate campaign against Joe Lieberman in 2006, announced Wednesday that he is running for governor in Connecticut.
Mr. Lamont said his agenda would focus on turning around Connecticut’s fiscal and economic problems.
